description: Bob Ross, prolific daytime television painting instructor who charmed the world with his serene monologues, continues to make the world a better place 20 years after his death. author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Indie horror game Horses is preparing to launch on December 2, on the Epic Games Store, GOG, Itch.io, and the Humble Store. But one place it won't be is on Steam, because Steam has banned the game for unclear reasons. And according to the developer, this ban seems likely to result in the shutdown of their entire studio.
title: Unsettling Horror Game Horses Banned From Steam, Leaving Studio With 'High Risk' of Closure
